svg.text: View Achievements Use Case
Use Case Specification
Use Case Name:
View Achievements
Actor(s):
Regular User
Description:
Comprehensive achievement tracking system displaying 20+ achievements with
progress indicators, XP rewards, unlock criteria, and completion status.
Preconditions:
1. User must be logged in with active account
Main Flow:
1. User accesses Achievements through Profile page Achievements tab
2. System displays comprehensive list of 20+ available achievements
3. Each achievement shows: icon, title, description, XP reward value
4. System displays completion status: Unlocked, In Progress, Locked
5. Unlocked achievements show completion date and earned XP
6. In Progress achievements display progress bar and current status
7. Locked achievements show unlock requirements and criteria
8. System categorizes achievements: Social, Match, Skill, Special
9. Achievement examples: First Match, Social Butterfly, Skill Master
10. System tracks total achievements unlocked and total XP earned
11. Recent achievement unlocks are highlighted with special indicators
12. System provides filtering options by category and completion status
Alternative Flows:
A1. New achievement unlock: System displays celebration animation and notification
A2. Progress update: System updates progress bars for in-progress achievements
A3. Filter by category: User filters achievements by specific categories
A4. View details: User clicks achievement for detailed requirements and tips
A5. Share achievement: User shares completed achievements on social features
A6. Achievement notification: System alerts user when close to unlocking
